# Exercise 2
        
```{r}
n = 30
mean.y = 350000
mean.x = 245000
standardDeviation.y = 61900
standardDeviation.x = 52100
V1 = standardDeviation.y^2/n
V2 = standardDeviation.x^2/n
std_err = sqrt(V1 + V2)
test_statistic = (mean.y - mean.x) / std_err
test_statistic
```
